title: Transforming Academic Library Education Practices in Response to COVID-19: Blended Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Exploration of educational models for academic libraries in the post-pandemic era, seeking teaching practices that simultaneously address students’ information literacy and socio-emotional needs through blended learning and technology integration.

learning_goals: Students can describe changes in academic library services post-COVID-19.
Students can apply strategies for effectively utilizing digital information resources in blended learning environments.
Students can complete academic information search projects using online collaboration tools.
Students can develop self-management strategies to address social and emotional challenges in the information access process.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
